realism.substrateUtilizationMethod: Hold the wooden handle so the smooth back faces outward and guide the sponge corner across that wooden back in gentle curves.
realism.expectedHapticFeedback: Oil paint on a large size canvas with a paint brush. With gentle pressure, the resistance increases smoothly with a subtle pushback sensation
realism.explanation: Hard flat wood, very small area; zero compliance or canvas-like tooth.

realism.physicalContactObject: green and yellow rectangular scrubbing sponge
realism.contactUtilizationMethod: Pinch one corner of the sponge between thumb and fingertips and move the hand in light sweeping arcs.
realism.substrateUtilizationMethod: Stand beside the chair and sweep the sponge corner across a flat section of the seat fabric in broad, arcing motions.
realism.expectedHapticFeedback: Oil paint on a large size canvas with a paint brush. With gentle pressure, the resistance increases smoothly with a subtle pushback sensation
realism.explanation: Large textile surface with underlying foam offers gradual compression and noticeable texture; still stiffer and coarser than primed canvas, but delivers the closest push-back progression among available objects.

realism.physicalContactObject: green and yellow rectangular scrubbing sponge
realism.contactUtilizationMethod: Pinch one corner of the sponge between thumb and fingertips and move the hand in light sweeping arcs.
realism.substrateUtilizationMethod: Lean toward the sofa and move the sponge corner over the flat seat upholstery in long sweeping arcs.
realism.expectedHapticFeedback: Oil paint on a large size canvas with a paint brush. With gentle pressure, the resistance increases smoothly with a subtle pushback sensation
realism.explanation: Broad fabric area with foam underneath provides smooth, graded resistance similar to brush bristle flex; weave is coarse and sponge footprint wide, so fidelity is moderate but acceptable.

realism.physicalContactObject: green and yellow rectangular scrubbing sponge
realism.physicalSubstrateObject: green and white turtle shell plush cushion
realism.contactUtilizationMethod: Pinch one corner of the sponge between thumb and fingertips and move the hand in light sweeping arcs.
realism.substrateUtilizationMethod: Hold the cushion steady on your lap and guide the sponge corner across the broad top panel in small curved sweeps.
realism.expectedHapticFeedback: Oil paint on a large size canvas with a paint brush. With gentle pressure, the resistance increases smoothly with a subtle pushback sensation
realism.explanation: Soft fabric skin with stuffing compresses smoothly, giving noticeable push-back very reminiscent of brush flex; domed shape limits flat stroke length, preventing higher realism.

realism.physicalContactObject: green and yellow rectangular scrubbing sponge
realism.contactUtilizationMethod: Pinch one corner of the sponge between thumb and fingertips and move the hand in light sweeping arcs.
realism.substrateUtilizationMethod: Place the package flat on the sofa and sweep the sponge corner across its front surface in overlapping arcs.
realism.expectedHapticFeedback: Oil paint on a large size canvas with a paint brush. With gentle pressure, the resistance increases smoothly with a subtle pushback sensation
realism.explanation: Similar to noodle bag: pliable plastic offers some compliant resistance, but crinkles create uneven feedback unlike uniform canvas tension.

realism.physicalContactObject: green and yellow rectangular scrubbing sponge
realism.contactUtilizationMethod: Pinch one corner of the sponge between thumb and fingertips and move the hand in light sweeping arcs.
realism.substrateUtilizationMethod: Hold the controller so the smooth underside faces outward and glide the sponge corner along that underside in gentle arcs.
realism.expectedHapticFeedback: Oil paint on a large size canvas with a paint brush. With gentle pressure, the resistance increases smoothly with a subtle pushback sensation
realism.explanation: Hard plastic, highly curved and small; no texture or compliance, giving none of the subtle incremental resistance of brush on canvas.
